version_description:
An information screen is shown immediately after launching the app if the device does not have a TrueDepth camera.
Added MyMaxon account registration support.
Added landscape orientation support for iPad.
Fixed crash if connecting to Cinema 4D when no captures are available.
Fixed multi-image capture recorded as single image after cancelling a first capture and starting a new one without leaving the camera view.
Some changes to the user-interface presentation.
